entry.title: KDE Plasma 5.25.5 released
entry.summary: KDE Plasma 5.25.5 has been released.Plasma 5.25.5 Today KDE releases a bugfix update to KDE Plasma 5, versioned 5.25.5. Plasma 5.25 was released in June 2022 with many feature refinements and new modules to complete the desktop experience. This release adds a month's worth of new translations and fixes from KDE's c ...
